welcome_message_body: "Welcome to La Crescenta-Montrose! Known for its charming small-town feel and stunning mountain views, we invite you to explore and experience all that this beautiful city has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bob Hope Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Bob Hope Airport, mostly used for regional flights.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Whiteman Airport serves as the hub for all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is reserved for private and charter flights, providing a more exclusive and luxurious experience for travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusive for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at El Monte Airport serves domestic flights and is equipped with modern amenities.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: The private jet terminal at El Monte Airport caters to executive and luxury travelers.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Santa Ynez Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Santa Ynez Airport is exclusively for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Compton Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Compton Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Torrance Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Torrance Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport is the hub for all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal offers exclusive services for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
